description: This file contains implementation details for classes related to Application Window Controller (AWC) state change notifications and listeners, including methods for managing listeners, notifying state changes, and handling window updates within a process container environment.

classes.name: AWCStateChangeNotifier
classes.description: Class responsible for managing listeners interested in AWC state changes, enabling adding, removing, and notifying listeners.

classes.name: AWCListener
classes.description: Class representing a listener that handles notifications about window state changes and service readiness, delegating notifications to an associated notifier.

methods.name: void addListener(AWCStateChangeListener * listener)
methods.description: Adds a listener to the notifier's list if it is not already registered.

methods.name: void removeListener(AWCStateChangeListener * listener)
methods.description: Removes a listener from the notifier's list.

methods.name: void notify(int req_id,awc::awc_app_state_t app_state,int status,unsigned int pid)
methods.description: Notifies all registered listeners of a state change with specified parameters.

methods.name: void notifyWindowChange(int window_id VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,awc::AWCClient::awc_window_state_t window_state VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,unsigned int pid VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED)
methods.description: Placeholder method for handling window change notifications; currently left empty.

methods.name: void notifyStateChange(int req_id,awc::awc_app_state_t app_state,int status,unsigned int pid)
methods.description: Handles notification of a change in app state and propagates it through the notifier.

methods.name: void notifyServiceReady()
methods.description: Placeholder method indicating the service is ready; currently performs no action.

ctags.name: notify
ctags.pattern: /^void AWCStateChangeNotifier::notify(int req_id, awc::awc_app_state_t app_state, int status, unsi/

ctags.name: notifyStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^void AWCListener::notifyStateChange(int req_id, awc::awc_app_state_t app_state, int status, unsi/

ctags.name: notifyWindowChange
ctags.signature: (int window_id VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,awc::AWCClient::awc_window_state_t window_state VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED,unsigned int pid VARIABLE_IS_NOT_USED)
